tasks.task: Assembling a compost bin using pallets and wire.
subtasks: Acquiring pallets from a local building supplier.
Standing pallets upright at the ends and middle to form bins.
Securing the pallets with bailing wire by looping it through and twisting.
Tightening the wire with pliers or nippers.
Removing excess wire and ensuring edges are safe.
Replicating the wire securing process on all four pallets.
Completing the bin by doing the same on top and bottom.

tasks.task: Assembling a compost bin using pallets and wire.**
subtasks: ** Get pallets from a local building supplier (plumbing supply outfit nearby).
** Stand two pallets upright at the ends and one in the middle to create three bins.
** Use bailing wire to loop through the pallet holes and twist tight. Employ a pair of pliers or nippers to secure the wire, ensuring no sharp edges remain.
** Repeat the wire-securing method on the remaining pallets for both the top and bottom.
** Cut off excess wire and ensure all connections are secure and safe.
